Comment: I found the Object Oriented module to be very intresting and useful, and it was the reason why I started learning SpringBoot. I gave it 4 stars though as I would have liked the TAs to be more engaging and helpful.

I was initially very excited to learn about Java, however I did not find the transition from Python to Java to be very smooth. I would have liked more support from the TAs and the lecturer. I gave it 3 stars.
This module is a MUST for every computer science student. OOP concepts are very important, and the Course Work made it fun and easy to understand
